data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module applies intelligent normalization to Library of
    Congress (and other) type call numbers so that they can be correctly
    sorted. Using this method, in production at my institution's
    library, we achieve well over 99% accuracy in sorting. In practice,
    errors have not been noticeable. Employing this algorithm leads to
    much improved results over what our current and previous library
    software vendors have provided.

    Brian Cassidy (brian@nald.ca) and I (Roy Zimmer, zimmer@wmich.edu)
    have been collaborating on getting this software to CPAN.
